item.description:
Bacco Ristorante (http://www.bacconorthend.com/) is an inexpensive North End restaurant, with a long bar and a nice view from the 2nd floor dining room. Prices are: Antipasto/Salad $8-15, Pasta $16-23, Entrees $18-26. We'll begin the evening with a cocktail hour at the bar from 6:00-7:00. And, afterward, we'll head to a North End cafe for coffee and dessert.

The restaurant is located at the corner of Salem and Parmenter Streets on the right-hand side. (If you saw "The Town" you might recognize the building across from it on Salem.) Please bring cash, if possible, as we won't get separate checks. Hope you can join us.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'About' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be at the bar from 6:00-7:00.
item.name: Bacco Ristorante-Dinner
